node.statement: CAUCHY-SCHWARZ ON COUPLED QUADRATIC FORMS: Express J_p = 2<h,alpha> + norm(alpha)^2 as a function of {m_j^p} and J_q similarly. The coupling omega_p + omega_q = z + F_r constrains sum m_j^p/(z-p_j^p) + sum m_k^q/(z-p_k^q) = F_r(z) - c_p - c_q. Under this linear constraint on the residues, apply matrix AM-GM: for positive semidefinite matrices A,B with a trace constraint, det(A)*det(B) >= det((A+B)/2)^2. The relevant matrices encode the quadratic forms J_p and J_q in the correction coordinates.
